about_developer.heading: Developer Name : Eldeco Group
about_developer.paragraph1: Since 1985, the Eldeco Group has been a pioneer in real estate development, known for its timely delivery and high-quality projects. With over 200 completed developments across 20 cities in North India, Eldeco’s portfolio spans large integrated townships, high-rise condominiums, industrial estates, malls, and office buildings. Currently, 30 more projects are underway. Having developed more than 30 million sq. ft. and served over 30,000 satisfied customers, Eldeco has established a strong presence in cities including Lucknow, Kanpur, Agra, Greater Noida, Noida, and Gurgaon—where the brand is synonymous with trust and excellence. The Group is also expanding in Panipat, Sonipat, Ludhiana, Jhansi, Bareilly, Panchkula, Neemrana, Delhi, Kasauli, Rudrapur, Gorakhpur, Rishikesh, and Jalandhar. Its flagship industrial development is the distinctive 1,200-acre Eldeco Sidcul Industrial Park located in Sitarganj, Uttarakhand.
about_developer.paragraph2: Eldeco’s strength is rooted in its professional and experienced workforce. Complementing our in-house expertise, we partner with top-tier consultants and contractors to consistently deliver high-quality projects. Our operations are founded on principles of superior construction, exceptional quality, and unwavering customer satisfaction. Over the years, the Group has earned numerous awards and accolades in recognition of its outstanding projects.
about_developer.conclusion: In conclusion, Eldeco Group’s commitment to excellence, strong professional team, and collaborative approach have established it as a trusted name in real estate. With a focus on quality construction and customer satisfaction, Eldeco continues to deliver remarkable projects that set industry benchmarks. Its consistent achievements and recognized expertise ensure a promising future as it expands and innovates in the real estate sector.

overview.heading: M3M Tee Point
overview.paragraph1: M3M Tee Point is a landmark commercial development by M3M Group, ideally situated on Golf Course Extension Road in Sector 65, Gurgaon, right near the entrance of M3M Golf Estate. Spanning 2 acres, the project is thoughtfully designed with two distinct blocks separated by a 24-meter wide road, and boasts a main frontage facing a 60-meter wide road. The development offers a magnificent frontage of nearly 260 meters, ensuring high visibility and accessibility for businesses. M3M Tee Point is surrounded by some of the most affluent residential communities in Gurgaon, making it a prime destination for retail, office, and F&B ventures seeking a premium address.
overview.paragraph2: The project features efficiently designed retail and F&B spaces ranging from 300 to 2,800 sq. ft., catering to a wide spectrum of business needs. With its strategic location, M3M Tee Point is poised to attract high footfall from the neighboring luxury residences and commercial hubs. The development is designed by UHA, a globally acclaimed London-based architecture studio, ensuring a blend of modern aesthetics and functional excellence. The project’s low-maintenance façade, elegant lighting, and contemporary finishes further enhance its appeal, making it an ideal choice for businesses looking to establish a strong presence in Gurgaon’s thriving commercial landscape.

features: A fabulous mix of office spaces, retail areas, and F&B outlets
Magnificent 260-meter frontage for maximum visibility
Surrounded by prime residential developments with affluent clientele
Designed by UHA, a renowned London-based architecture studio
Low-maintenance façade with large glazing and permanent finishes
Elegant lighting design for façade and architectural features
Retail spaces on ground and first floors; offices from 2nd floor onwards

specifications.heading: Project Specifications & Amenities
specifications.paragraph1: M3M Tee Point is meticulously planned to offer a seamless experience for both businesses and visitors. The retail shops are located on the ground and first floors, featuring glazed fronts and dedicated signage areas for each unit, ensuring excellent branding opportunities. The structure is built with RCC framing and masonry partitions for durability and safety. The pedestrian plaza is thoughtfully landscaped with seating areas and kiosks, creating a vibrant and welcoming environment for shoppers and diners.
specifications.paragraph2: The project includes a dedicated drop-off zone, on-site parking areas shaded by canopy trees, and a beautifully landscaped environment. The exterior is finished with a combination of stone, tiles, ACP, and painted surfaces, while the lobbies and basements are adorned with high-quality materials. Security is a top priority, with CCTV surveillance, manned lobbies, boom barriers at all vehicular entry and exit points, and comprehensive fire safety systems including wet risers, hose reels, sprinklers, and fully automatic diesel generators for 100% power backup.

Dedicated signage areas for all retail units

Spanning 3.92 acres as part of the larger 17.5-acre Urbana complex, Urbana Premium offers a dynamic mix of retail, anchor stores, restaurants, food courts, office spaces, and serviced apartments managed by a renowned operator. Its location on the metro corridor further enhances connectivity, making it a highly attractive destination for both patrons and office goers.

The integration of lower ground, ground, upper ground, and first floors as retail blocks, connected to serviced apartments and office blocks, ensures a vibrant and secure environment for shopping, dining, and business.

The development is designed to recreate the quintessential California experience, blending vibrant retail, sophisticated office spaces, and lifestyle amenities.

overview.heading: M3M 65th Avenue – International Mixed-Use High Street Retail in Sector 65, Gurgaon
overview.paragraph1: M3M 65th Avenue is a landmark commercial project in Sector 65, Gurgaon, offering a futuristic and international mixed-use development that combines high-street retail with Uber residences. Spanning 14 acres, it is the largest high-street retail market in the NCR, designed to create a vibrant environment with a secure mix of living spaces and retail. The project is a tribute to the energy and aspirations of Gurugram, providing a dynamic center of attention for the city.

The project is ready to move, with construction by TATA Projects and a host of A+ brands already signed.

overview.heading: M3M Broadway – High-Street Retail & Commercial Landmark in Sector 71, Gurgaon
overview.paragraph1: M3M Broadway is a unique, one-of-its-kind commercial project in Sector 71, Gurgaon, spread over 8.5 acres on the main Southern Periphery Road. The development offers a vibrant mix of high-end retail shops, world-class commercial spaces (Ground + 22), studio apartments (Ground + 12), a multiplex on the 3rd and 4th floors, a game zone, fun zone, and terrace restaurants. With exclusive two-side access and a prime corner location, M3M Broadway sets a new precedent for affluence and exuberance in Gurugram’s commercial landscape.
overview.paragraph2: Strategically planned and exquisitely designed, M3M Broadway is a self-sufficient destination featuring premium double-height shops, food franchises, office spaces, and high-end studio apartments. The project’s open landscape, wide boulevards, and grand plaza with large frontage create a visual masterpiece, ensuring flawless connectivity and uninterrupted views of retail outlets. The development is designed to offer an upper-crust shopping and dining experience, with open-to-sky courtyards and 12-meter-wide boulevards.

The project is designed to set new standards in design, quality, and operational management, with large floor plates, open span design, and a central corridor that maximizes spaciousness and natural light.

With over 80,000 square feet of retail space across two floors, it provides the perfect opportunity to mix business with pleasure in a modern, vibrant setting.

about_developer.heading: Developer Name : Elan
about_developer.paragraph1: Widely recognized for developing some of the most iconic commercial complexes, the Elan Group stands as a prominent leader among real estate developers in Gurgaon. Since its inception, the company has built a distinguished legacy centered on innovation, quality, and unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction.
about_developer.paragraph2: The group has been honored with multiple awards for its commercial developments, including the prestigious Iconic Project of the Year award in 2020. The distinctive and refined design philosophy of the Elan Group aligns perfectly with the evolving needs of modern India. With this vision, the company has initiated several projects in Gurgaon. Recognizing the immense potential of the Delhi NCR region, the group has strategically invested in numerous commercial ventures to foster economic growth and create new income opportunities for the local community. In this article, we will explore some of these notable projects, along with a flagship residential development led by the Elan Group.
about_developer.conclusion: The Group has secured its leading position among real estate developers in Gurgaon by consistently prioritizing customer satisfaction. Companies that genuinely understand and address their customers’ needs are well-equipped to deliver the same level of excellence and superior results as demonstrated by the Elan Group.
